name: Robodogs (dutchlish)
description:
ROBODOGS

This was a photo-finish, these are the known minor bugs: 

1. Sometimes there can be a WebGL error on 'R for restart', just refresh the browser if this happens.

2. If you press space after the wave ends and the upgrade screen opens it can automatically select an upgrade, the last one you had chosen at the last upgrade.

3. After the first wave the Drone (AI) can have an extra 5 lives. This only works in your favour though.

4. You may pay for adding lives to the Drone (AI) if the lives are already maxed out. You may pay $500 but not get any improvement. 

AWSD to move player, space to shoot

The drone will follow the mouse, the more intelligent it gets, the faster it will follow.

Only the drone can collect the loot!!! 

Credits:

Code and game design: Mike Bailey

Free font: Thalea Fat

Art assets:
